release.title: EU Production Release
release.description: BlackLine will be performing the 7.15.0 release to Production. Any jobs submitted after the start of the deployment window will be queued and completed after the release. There is no expected downtime during the release window. Users with active sessions will be returned to the login page at the transition. Release Notes will be made available in the Community prior to each release.

release.title: Production Maintenance Release
release.description: BlackLine will be performing a maintenance release in our production environments on September 8, 2017 from 5:00 PM - 9:00 PM PT (UTC September 9, 2017 Midnight - 4:00 AM). Jobs submitted at the start of the release window will be held in queue and processed at the completion of the release window. This change was released to sandbox on September 7, 2017 at 7:30 PM PT. We are releasing this specific update to the production environments ahead of the original September 22, 2017 production release schedule to minimize the impact to your August close cycle. The release notes are posted in the Documentation Release Notes section.

release.title: Production Maintenance Release

release.title: Production Maintenance
release.description: To minimize client impact after the degradation from yesterday, we are performing some maintenance to ensure all client jobs are processing as expected. Some clients may experience temporary unavailability of files during this maintenance.

release.title: FTP Maintenance Sandbox and Production US Data Center
release.description: BlackLine will be performing FTP maintenance in our sandbox and production US data center on October 21, 2017 from 8:00 AM – 12:00 PM PT (October 21, 3:00 PM to 7:00 PM UTC). During this time, the FTP service will be unavailable, jobs will be paused, and no import requests will be accepted.FTP imports scheduled to run during this maintenance window will resume processing when BlackLine restores FTP service. Non-scheduled jobs cannot be submitted during the maintenance window and should be resubmitted after the maintenance has been completed.

release.title: FTP Maintenance Sandbox and Production US Data Center
release.description: BlackLine will be performing FTP maintenance in our sandbox and production US data center on October 21, 2017 from 8:00 AM – 12:00 PM PT (October 21, 3:00 PM to 7:00 PM UTC). During this time, the FTP service will be unavailable, jobs will be paused, and no import requests will be accepted.FTP imports scheduled to run during this maintenance window will resume processing when BlackLine restores FTP service. Non-scheduled jobs cannot be submitted during the maintenance window and should be resubmitted after the maintenance has been completed.

release.title: Las Vegas Sandbox Infrastructure Maintenance
release.description: BlackLine will be performing maintenance in our Las Vegas Sandbox environment; during this maintenance, job processing will be paused and newly submitted jobs will be queued until the maintenance has completed. Services will be restarted and processing will resume to complete the jobs in queue.

release.title: Maintenance
release.description: At 6pm PDT, BlackLine is restarting the Matching Import Service.  All new jobs will be suspended starting at 5pm PDT until the restart is complete.  Jobs in process at the start of this maintenance will be allowed to finish processing before the restart.

release.title: Emergency Preventive Maintenance
release.description: BlackLine will be performing Emergency Preventive Maintenance to our Sandbox and Production environments in all data centers from November 10 at 10:00 PM to November 11 at 12:00 AM PST (November 11 at 6:00 AM to 8:00 AM UTC).Clients may continue to use the Application during the maintenance window. New reporting, bulk-certification of journals, and uploading documents (Sandbox only) may be temporarily unavailable during that period.
